docna.cdata!:
Indonesia - Irrigation Rehabilitation
            Project : Credit 0127  - Credit Agreement - Conformed

display_title.display_title:
Indonesia - Irrigation
            Rehabilitation Project : Credit 0127  - Credit Agreement - Conformed

17823014.admreg: East Asia and Pacific,East Asia and Pacific

abstracts.cdata!:
The project comprises the rehabilitation
            of three irrigation systems in Java and the completion of
            new irrigation system in South Sumatra with a total area of
            about 198,000 hectares, and the preparation of a further
            project for irrigation rehabilitation in other areas.
